content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Hello Nesibe,

Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. I appreciate your time and consideration.

Regarding the rental price, I am open to negotiation. However, I must remind you that the apartment is quite small, only 25 square meters. Therefore, I would expect a fair price for the space. I would be willing to discuss a reasonable rental price that takes into account the size of the apartment and the location in Munich.

Please let me know your proposed rental price, and we can continue the negotiation from there. If we are unable to reach an agreement, I am willing to terminate the negotiation.

I look forward to hearing your proposal.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
The landlord proposes 300 Euros per month. Do you agree to the rental price of 300 Euros per month?

Please answer "I agree to the price of 300 Euros per month" if you agree to the rental price proposed by the landlord. If you don't agree to the rental price, please say "I do not agree to the price of 300 Euros per month" and provide a reason for your disagreement.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I agree to the price of 300 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
The landlord proposes 350 Euros per month. Do you agree to the rental price of 350 Euros per month?

Please answer "I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month" if you agree to the rental price proposed by the landlord. If you don't agree to the rental price, please say "I do not agree to the price of 350 Euros per month" and provide a reason for your disagreement.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I do not agree to the price of 350 Euros per month. While the apartment is small, the location in Munich is desirable, and I believe a rental price of 350 Euros per month is too high for the space. I would be willing to negotiate a lower rental price that takes into account the size of the apartment and its location in Munich.
name: Heinrich Heine
